title: National Adaptation Plan Development
description_and_objectives: Training and workshops to support the development of a national adaptation plan.
additional_information: In partnership with the UNFCCC.

title: Greenhouse Gas Inventory Training
description_and_objectives: Training for staff on methodologies and best practices for GHG inventories.
additional_information: Aimed at improving the quality of national reporting.

title: Climate Finance Governance Workshop
description_and_objectives: Workshop to enhance capacity for accessing and managing international climate finance.
additional_information: Part of a regional climate finance initiative.

title: Renewable Energy Policy and Regulation
description_and_objectives: Technical assistance for developing renewable energy policy frameworks.
additional_information: Focused on promoting private investment in renewable energy.

title: Climate Risk Assessment Training for Banking Sector
description_and_objectives: Training on assessing and disclosing climate-related financial risks.
additional_information: Collaboration with a private sector financial institution.

title: National Low-Carbon Strategy Development
description_and_objectives: Technical support for designing a national low-carbon development strategy.
additional_information: A long-term partnership project.

title: Sustainable Urban Planning Training
description_and_objectives: Training on integrating climate resilience into urban planning processes.
additional_information: Includes study tours to German cities.

title: Disaster Risk Reduction and Early Warning
description_and_objectives: Training for officials on operating and maintaining early warning systems.
additional_information: Part of a larger bilateral cooperation on disaster management.

title: Project Proposal Development for GCF
description_and_objectives: Training on developing high-quality project proposals for submission to the Green Climate Fund.
additional_information: Aimed at increasing access to international climate funds.

title: Climate-Smart Agriculture Practices
description_and_objectives: Workshops and field training for farmers on climate-resilient farming techniques.
additional_information: Collaboration with local farmer cooperatives.

title: National REDD+ Strategy
description_and_objectives: Technical assistance for developing and implementing a national REDD+ strategy.
additional_information: Supports forest conservation efforts.

title: Circular Economy Policy Development
description_and_objectives: Policy advisory services to develop a national circular economy framework.
additional_information: Focuses on waste reduction and resource efficiency.

title: Just Transition Advisory Services
description_and_objectives: Advisory services to support a just transition for coal-dependent communities.
additional_information: In response to a national coal phase-out plan.

title: Climate Change Data Collection and Analysis
description_and_objectives: Training on climate-related data collection, analysis, and reporting.
additional_information: Aims to improve data for evidence-based policy making.

title: Water Security and Management
description_and_objectives: Capacity-building on integrated water resource management in a changing climate.
additional_information: Supports adaptation to water stress and variability.

title: Urban Climate Resilience Planning
description_and_objectives: Technical support and training on incorporating climate resilience into city planning.
additional_information: Focuses on urban infrastructure and ecosystems.

title: Green Bond Market Development
description_and_objectives: Advisory services to support the development of a domestic green bond market.
additional_information: Aimed at mobilizing private finance for climate projects.

title: National Adaptation Communication (AC)
description_and_objectives: Technical support for preparing the country's first Adaptation Communication.
additional_information: In line with Paris Agreement reporting requirements.

title: Carbon Pricing and Markets Workshop
description_and_objectives: Training for officials on designing and implementing carbon pricing mechanisms.
additional_information: Supports the development of a national carbon market.

title: Climate-Resilient Housing Development
description_and_objectives: Training for engineers and architects on building climate-resilient homes.
additional_information: Focuses on storm and flood-prone regions.

title: Climate-Smart Forestry Planning
description_and_objectives: Training on sustainable forest management and land-use planning.
additional_information: Supports the country's NDC goals for land use.

title: Waste Management and Recycling Systems
description_and_objectives: Technical assistance for optimizing municipal waste management and recycling systems.
additional_information: Aimed at reducing landfill methane emissions.

title: Coastal Ecosystems Restoration Workshop
description_and_objectives: Workshop on methods and best practices for coastal ecosystem restoration.
additional_information: Promotes nature-based solutions.

title: Sustainable Fisheries Policy
description_and_objectives: Capacity-building for developing and enforcing sustainable fisheries policies.
additional_information: Supports the long-term sustainability of marine resources.

title: National Climate Change Reporting
description_and_objectives: Training on preparing national reports under the Paris Agreement.
additional_information: Supports enhanced transparency framework.

title: Geothermal Project Development Skills
description_and_objectives: Training for engineers on the development and operation of geothermal projects.
additional_information: Aims to expand the use of geothermal energy.

title: Community-Based Adaptation
description_and_objectives: Training for local officials on designing and implementing community-based adaptation projects.
additional_information: Empowers local communities to address climate risks.

title: E-Mobility Policy and Planning
description_and_objectives: Technical assistance on developing policies for a national electric mobility transition.
additional_information: Part of a national strategy for transport decarbonization.

title: Climate-Resilient Infrastructure Planning
description_and_objectives: Training for government engineers on designing climate-resilient public infrastructure.
additional_information: Supports the integration of climate risk into infrastructure planning.

title: Green Budgeting and Public Expenditure
description_and_objectives: Technical advisory on integrating climate goals into national budgeting processes.
additional_information: Promotes a greener fiscal policy.
